root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 16-3-2, translated into en
root.data: After data collection, they are inserted in the Penitentiary Information Management System (GIP), which is a platform for prison management where all inmates' information is recorded, from their entry to the establishment until the end of their sentence, done this information is sent to the Department for its validation following the following sequence technicians, head of department and finally Director.
